section.title: Removing a Red Hat Gluster Storage Node
section.para: Remove a Red Hat Gluster Storage node from your Red Hat Virtualization environment.

procedure.title: Removing a Red Hat Gluster Storage Node

step.para: Use the Hosts resource tab, tree mode, or the search function to find and select the Red Hat Gluster Storage node in the results list.
Click Maintenance to open the Maintenance Host(s) confirmation window.
Click OK to move the host to maintenance mode.
Click Remove to open the Remove Host(s) confirmation window.
Select the Force Remove check box if the node has volume bricks on it, or if the node is non-responsive.
Click OK to remove the node and close the window.

section.para: Your Red Hat Gluster Storage node has been removed from the environment and is no longer visible in the Hosts tab.
